Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Khuwipsamtek with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the cord of a seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the legs is inscribed with a central column of incised Hieroglyphs within a border, there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Curator's comments: See also .8933 See also .8934 See also .8935 See also .8936
